achievements.title: Built 4 Production-Grade Full Stack Projects
achievements.description: Designed and developed multiple full-stack applications including AI-powered healthcare platform, pharmaceutical ERP system, AI therapy assistant, and a full-stack CLI app generator.

achievements.title: AI Integration in Real-World Applications
achievements.description: Integrated Google Gemini models using Genkit for prescription scanning, symptom checking, and AI-assisted conversation systems.

achievements.title: Full-Stack NPM CLI Tool Published
achievements.description: Developed and structured a full-stack React + Express + SQLite project generator using a custom CLI architecture.

achievements.title: GST-Compliant Billing System Implementation
achievements.description: Implemented dynamic GST calculation, profit & loss reporting, and input tax credit tracking in a pharmaceutical ERP system.

achievements.title: Firebase Cloud Deployment Experience
achievements.description: Deployed production-ready Next.js applications using Firebase App Hosting with authentication and Firestore security rules.

achievements.title: Built Business Analytics Dashboards
achievements.description: Created basic sales and GST dashboards using SQL and Power BI to analyze revenue trends, profit margins, and tax liabilities.
